#summary Patcher will Byte patch v1.1.2 lockdown (activate)

= Introduction =

Patcher will Byte patch v1.1.2 lockdown (activate) 
Can be run on PC or on iPhone.


= Details =

./patcher -l <lockdown file> will patch the lockdown file (when on PC)<br>
./patcher -a will patch the lockdown file when it's native on the iPhone<br>
./patcher -m -o <orig file> -n <new file> will generate patching information (PC or iPhone)<br>
